resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105421</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105421</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1800931156</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Kids Open Dictionary Builder.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zicklein Öffnen Verzeichnis-Erbauer.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Gosses Ouvrent Le Constructeur de 
Dictionnaire.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os Miúdos Abrem O Construtor Do Dicionário.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I Capretti Aprono Il Costruttore Del Dizionario.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανοικτός οικοδόμος λεξικών κατσικιών.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los Cabritos Abren El Constructor Del Diccionario.</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The purpose of this project is to create a free, open simple dictionary for students to use. This dictionary will ultimately be published in a variety of formats and for multiple platforms.

To add to this project, find a word you'd like to write a definition for or click "Instant Karma" for a random word. Please consult the style guidelines for editorial information.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Zweck dieses Projektes ist, ein freies, geöffnetes 
einfaches Verzeichnis herzustellen, damit Kursteilnehmer verwenden. 
Dieses Verzeichnis wird schließlich in einer Vielzahl von 
Formaten veröffentlicht und für mehrfaches platforms.To fügen Sie 
diesem Projekt, finden ein Wort hinzu, das Sie eine Definition für 
schreiben oder "sofortiges Karma" für ein gelegentliches Wort 
anklicken möchten. Beraten Sie bitte die Artkorrekturlinien zu 
redaktioneller Information.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le but de ce projet est de créer un dictionnaire simple 
libre et ouvert pour que les étudiants utilisent. Ce 
dictionnaire sera finalement édité dans une variété de formats et 
pour platforms.To multiple ajoutez à ce projet, trouvent un mot que 
vous voudriez écrire une définition pour ou cliquer "le 
karma instantané" pour un mot aléatoire. Veuillez consulter 
les directives de modèle pour l'information éditoriale.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A finalidade deste projeto é criar um dicionário simples
livre, aberto para que os estudantes usem-se. Este dicionário 
será publicado finalmente em uma variedade dos formatos e para 
platforms.To múltiplo adicione a este projeto, encontram uma palavra 
que você gostaria de escrever uma definição para ou de estalar "o 
karma imediato" para uma palavra aleatória. Consulte por favor 
os guidelines do estilo para a informação editorial.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lo scopo di questo progetto è creare un dizionario 
semplice libero e aperto affinchè gli allievi usi. Questo 
dizionario infine sarà pubblicato in una varietà di formati e per 
platforms.To multiplo aggiunga a questo progetto, trovano una parola 
che vorreste scrivere una definizione per o scattare "il karma 
istante" per una parola casuale. Consulti prego la guida di 
riferimento di stile per le informazioni editoriali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο σκοπός αυτού του προγράμματος είναι να δημιουργηθεί
ένα ελεύθερο, ανοικτό απλό λεξικό για τους σπουδαστές στη 
χρήση. Αυτό το λεξικό θα δημοσιευθεί τελικά με ποικίλες 
μορφές και για τις πολλαπλάσιες πλατφόρμες Για να προσθέσετε
σε αυτό το πρόγραμμα, βρείτε ότι μια λέξη you'd επιθυμεί να 
γράψει έναν καθορισμό για ή να χτυπήσει "στιγμιαίο Karma" για
μια τυχαία λέξη. Παρακαλώ συμβουλευθείτε τις οδηγίες ύφους
για τις εκδοτικές πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El propósito de este proyecto es crear un diccionario 
simple libre, abierto para que los estudiantes utilicen. Este 
diccionario será publicado en última instancia en una variedad de 
formatos y para platforms.To múltiple agregue a este proyecto, 
encuentran una palabra que usted quisiera escribir una definición 
para o hacer clic "karma inmediato" para una palabra al azar. 
Consulte por favor las guías de consulta del estilo para la 
información editorial.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1800931156</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Public Domain</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105421</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/kids-open-dictionary-builder</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
